Gallery

Reviews

review by - Yelp

Cal L:

Outstanding on everything from music to service to beer and food . Smoked ribs were to die for! We got it on open music night and it was a blast. We are already planning to go here again.

review by - Yelp

Wendy R:

Ribs delicious and huge. Brisket was outstanding. Wings were also very good. Nice atmosphere and quality service. Also had a great band so that added a star to the entire experience.

review by - Yelp

Ingrid J:

GREAT BBQ...we smelled the BBQ lingering in the air that we had to stop. Thank God we did because this place has the BEST BBQ ever (and we live in Savannah)! Come by and I promise you, you will NOT BE DISAPPOINTED!

review by - Yelp

Emily M:

Brisket is super underrated. I think they've made some changes, and I'd put their bbq up against any others in town. The smoked wings are the best I've had. Love the atmosphere, and the live music. Good vibe, and awesome outdoor seating space.

review by - Yelp

George D:

Holy cow, that was some good BBQ. Stopped by on a whim. Everyone really enjoyed the food. Wraps, potatoes, brisket, pulled pork, ribs. The coleslaw was fanatic also. You can't go wrong.

Karaoke Night in Park Circle!

Thursday January 22nd

Every Thursday

Join us for Karaoke, every Thursday in Park Circle. Hosted by DJ Pink Whiskey Cowboy, from 7-10pm!

07:00 PM - 10:00 PM
2026-01-22 19:00:00 2026-01-22 22:00:00 America/New_York Karaoke Night in Park Circle! Join us for Karaoke, every Thursday in Park Circle. Hosted by DJ Pink Whiskey Cowboy, from 7-10pm! Southern Roots Smokehouse Southern Roots Smokehouse emilym@lucky17restaurants.com 
2nd Annual Barks & Bushels Oyster Roast & Adoption Event in Park Circle!

Sunday January 25th
Join us Sunday, Jan. 25th in Park Circle for our 2nd Annual Barks & Bushels event, in partnership with The Charleston Animal Society. 
Enjoy an All-You-Can-Eat experience from 1-4pm for $35, and receive a $10 gift card to Southern Roots Smokehouse by bringing a bag of dog food to donate.

Indulge in our Bloody Mary Bar, sponsored by Wheatly's Vodka. We've got live music with Dan & The Donuts for those of you just looking to unwind.

All-You-Can-Eat Tickets: https://tinyurl.com/BarksBushels

This is a kid and dog friendly event, so bring the entire family! We can't wait to see you there!

01:00 PM - 04:00 PM
